code: export var getIndex=function getIndex(index){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'USER_INDEX',payload:index});};};export var clearIndex=function clearIndex(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'CLEAR_INDEX',payload:undefined});};};export var editMode=function editMode(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'EDIT_MODE',payload:'edit_mode'});};};export var clearMode=function clearMode(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'CLEAR_MODE',payload:null});};};export var addMode=function addMode(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'ADD_MODE',payload:'add_mode'});};};
